AI Bootcamp â€“ Agent Questions & Answers

This document contains example questions and answers for an AI assistant designed to respond to
students interested in an Artificial Intelligence Bootcamp.

Q: What is this AI Bootcamp about?

Q: What is this AI Bootcamp about?

A: This bootcamp is an intensive training program focused on Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and
practical applications such as AI Agents, NLP, and Computer Vision.

Q: Who can apply to the bootcamp?

Q: Who can apply to the bootcamp?

A: The bootcamp is open to students, graduates, and professionals with basic programming knowledge in
Python or JavaScript and an interest in AI.

Q: Do I need prior experience in AI?

Q: Do I need prior experience in AI?

A: No advanced AI experience is required. We start with fundamentals and progressively move to
advanced topics.

Q: What technologies will I learn?

Q: What technologies will I learn?

A: You will learn Python, Machine Learning algorithms, Deep Learning, LLMs, AI Agents, APIs, and
deployment tools.

Q: Is the bootcamp online or in-person?

A: The bootcamp is delivered in hybrid mode, with both online sessions and in-person workshops.

Q: How long does the bootcamp last?

A: The bootcamp typically lasts between 8 and 12 weeks, including projects and evaluations.

Q: Will I work on real projects?

A: Yes, participants work on real-world projects such as chatbots, AI agents, recommendation systems,
and data analysis dashboards.

Q: Do you provide a certificate?

A: Yes, a certificate of completion is provided at the end of the bootcamp.

Q: How does the AI agent help students?

A: The AI agent answers questions about the program, schedule, prerequisites, pricing, and guides
students through the registration process.

Q: How can I register?
A: You can register by filling out the online application form and our team will contact you for the next steps.
